articles.title: IPL 2021 New Rules: Check changes and New Rules by BCCI for IPL 2021 - InsideSport
articles.description: IPL 2021: In the revised rules, the 20th over must be finished in 90 minutes. Previously, the 20th over was to start by the 90th minute.
articles.content: IPL 2021 New Rules: The BCCI, in the revised playing conditions for IPL 2021, circulated among the franchises said the 20th over must be finished in 90 minutes. Previously, the 20th over was to start… [+3729 chars]
